name: A light in the void
description:
Controls :
WSAD or Arrows to move around
Press the SPACEBAR to interact with objects
Use your mouse to move the camera around, and scroll to zoom in or out

Hope you'll like the concept !
Solo made for the Mini Game Jam 67 (Void)
Still working on it and giving updates

Credits :
SineFX for the Transluscent Crystals asset pack (Unity asset store)
BrokenVector for the Low Poly Tree  asset pack (Unity asset store)
poinl for the "Ominous" music asset (opengameart.org)
aarrnnoo for the crying sound FX (freesound.org)
